snippet: The Senate Agriculture Committee announced Tuesday that it would begin working on a new farm bill next week, reviving efforts to pass the once-every-five-years spending bill that sets the nation’s food and farm policy. The last farm bill was passed...
abstract: The Senate Agriculture Committee announced Tuesday that it would begin working on a new farm bill next week, reviving efforts to pass the once-every-five-years spending bill that sets the nation’s food and farm policy. The last farm bill was passed in 2008.

headline.main: Congress Set to Begin Work on Farm Bill
